name: BirthdayReminder
0:
”Alexa, Launch Birthday reminder”
”Alexa, start Birthday reminder”
”Alexa, open Birthday reminder”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: birthday reminder
des:
Reminds you the birthday of your friend, family and relatives.
You can never forget your precious person's birthday!

Usage:
Provide access for Reminders while Enabling

User : "Alexa, open birthday reminder"
Alexa : "Welcome to Birthday Reminder, What's the name of the birthday person?"
User : "john"
Alexa : "On which date and month you want me to remind for John's birthday?"
User : "may twenty"
Alexa : "At what time should I remind you on every year of may 20"
User : "six a. m."
Alexa : "Would you like me to remind you for John's birthday on may 20, at 06:00?"
User : "yes"
Alexa : "Okay, I’ll remind you upto 5 years on 20 of may for John's birthday."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
